definition: to lay (railroad tracks, carpet, pipeline)/to install (wiring, cable)/to construct (road, concrete slab)
to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/store
plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display

sentences.english: By the end of 2001, natural gas conveyer pipeline can be laid down to our factory.
sentences.chinese: 2001年底，天然气输送管道即可铺设至天津碱厂。

sentences.english: The workers are laying pipes under the road.
sentences.chinese: 工人们正在道路下面铺设管道。

sentences.english: Based on a method of positioning by the nodule of pipeline, various pipeline laying can be conveniently realized.
sentences.chinese: 提出的管头定位法有利于各种复杂要求的管线铺设。

sentences.english: These are the minimum number of steps when laying flagstone by dry construction.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是最低人数时铺设石板干施工步骤。

sentences.english: Stone is the pavement to pave this road.
sentences.chinese: 这条路的铺设材料是石头。

sentences.english: The research on the dynamic response of the antisymmetric angle- ply laminated plate is presented.
sentences.chinese: 旨在研究反对称角铺设层合板的动力响应。

sentences.english: At what angle should the steel cords be laid?
sentences.chinese: 在什么角度应铺设钢线？

sentences.english: I have been laying low for a while.
sentences.chinese: 我已经铺设低一段时间。

sentences.english: Board grow an edge to answer along fore-and- aft laid, nailhole place uses gesso dirt child smooth.
sentences.chinese: 板的长边应沿纵向铺设，钉眼处用石膏腻子抹平。

sentences.english: Zhang Qishan command zhang adjutant laying such as explosives, blow up mine.
sentences.chinese: 张启山命令张副官等铺设炸药，炸毁矿洞。

sentences.english: There are laying down gas pipes .
sentences.chinese: 他们正在铺设煤气管道。

sentences.english: The cost of putting a cable underground is between four and ten times as much as that of carrying it on a pylon.
sentences.chinese: 地下铺设电缆的造价是架设高空线塔的四到十倍。

sentences.english: We pave the sunlit path toward justice together, brick by brick.
sentences.chinese: 我们共同一砖一瓦地铺设一条通往公平正义的路。

sentences.english: Our neighborhood will be piped for gas.
sentences.chinese: 我们这个地区将要“铺设”煤气管。

sentences.english: A raised flowerbed can be built by laying wood in a square and filling it with compost.
sentences.chinese: 凸起的花坛可以通过铺设在填方木和堆肥它建成。

definition: to install (water pipes, landmines etc) underground
to construct/to erect

to build/to construct
to finish work/to complete a project

to pave
